description: Here are all the privacy applications and components we develop ourselves and offer online..

links.name: Conspire
links.tagline: Anonymous, end-to-end encrypted chat rooms. No account needed, no data stored.

links.name: Zenroom
links.tagline: Makes it easy to build all sort of encryption protocols for your own application.

links.name: Tomb
links.tagline: Encrypt terabytes of files and folders in secret volumes, guaranteed to work in 20 years from now.

links.name: Secrets
links.tagline: Split a secret text into shares. Shares can be later combined (some, or all) to retrieve the secret text.

links.name: Jaromail
links.tagline: Suite of console tools to read, download, archive and search e-mails without storing them online.

links.name: Tinfoil
links.tagline: Minimalist launch wrapper to manage multiple isolated profiles for web browsers on GNU/Linux desktop.

links.name: Binnit
links.tagline: Self-hosted, minimal, no-fuss pastebin service clone in golang.

links.name: DNSCrypt-proxy v2
links.tagline: DNSCrypt-Proxy v2 client-server originally written in C++.

links.name: DOHD
links.tagline: DNS-over-HTTPS proxy in C for self-hosting: super fast and keeps no logs
